title: Storms Mobilize Organophosphate Esters, Bisphenols, PFASs, and Vehicle-derived Contaminants to San Francisco Bay Watersheds

In urban to peri-urban watersheds such as those surrounding San Francisco Bay, stormwater runoff is a major pathway by which contaminants enter aquatic ecosystems. We evaluated the occurrence of 154...
